verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass afterward, <S%G2517><s%> that he went <S%G1353><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> and village, <S%G2968><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> and showing the glad <S%G2097><s%> tidings <S%G2097><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and the twelve <S%G1427><s%> were with him,

And certain <S%G5100><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had been healed <S%G2390><s%> of evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> and infirmities, <S%G769><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> out of whom <S%G3739><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%>

And Joanna <S%G2489><s%> the wife <S%G1135><s%> of Chuza <S%G5529><s%> Herod's <S%G2264><s%> steward, <S%G2012><s%> and Susanna, <S%G4677><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> to him of their substance. <S%G5224><s%>

And when much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> were gathered <S%G4896><s%> together, <S%G4896><s%> and were come <S%G1975><s%> to him out of every <S%G2596><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> he spoke <S%G2036><s%> by a parable: <S%G3850><s%>

A sower <S%G4687><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to sow <S%G4687><s%> his seed: <S%G4703><s%> and as he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side; <S%G3844><s%> and it was trodden <S%G2662><s%> down, <S%G2662><s%> and the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> it.

And some <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on a rock; <S%G4073><s%> and as soon as it was sprung <S%G5453><s%> up, it withered <S%G3583><s%> away, because <S%G1223><s%> it lacked <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> moisture. <S%G2429><s%>
And some <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> thorns; <S%G173><s%> and the thorns <S%G173><s%> sprang <S%G4855><s%> up with it, and choked <S%G638><s%> it.

And other <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and sprang <S%G5453><s%> up, and bore <S%G4160><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> an hundred times. <S%G1542><s%> And when he had said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, he cried, <S%G5455><s%> He that has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> might this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> be?

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> To you it is given <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but to others <S%G3062><s%> in parables; <S%G3850><s%> that seeing <S%G991><s%> they might not see, <S%G991><s%> and hearing <S%G191><s%> they might not understand. <S%G4920><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> is this: <S%G3778><s%> The seed <S%G4703><s%> is the word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Those <S%G3588><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side <S%G3844><s%> are they that hear; <S%G191><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> and takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> out of their hearts, <S%G2588><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should believe <S%G4100><s%> and be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

They on <S%G1909><s%> the rock <S%G4073><s%> are they, which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they hear, <S%G191><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> with joy; <S%G5479><s%> and these <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> for a while <S%G2540><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and in time <S%G2540><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> fall <S%G868><s%> away. <S%G868><s%>

And that which fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> are they, which, when they have heard, <S%G191><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> forth, <S%G4198><s%> and are choked <S%G4846><s%> with cares <S%G3308><s%> and riches <S%G4149><s%> and pleasures <S%G2237><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> life, <S%G979><s%> and bring <S%G5052><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fruit <S%G5062><s%> to perfection. <S%G5052><s%>

But that on <S%G1722><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%> are they, which <S%G3748><s%> in an honest <S%G2570><s%> and good <S%G18><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> having heard <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> keep <S%G2722><s%> it, and bring <S%G2592><s%> forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> with patience. <S%G5281><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> when he has lighted <S%G681><s%> a candle, <S%G3088><s%> covers <S%G2572><s%> it with a vessel, <S%G4632><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> puts <S%G5087><s%> it under <S%G5270><s%> a bed; <S%G2825><s%> but sets <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> a candlestick, <S%G3087><s%> that they which enter <S%G1531><s%> in may see <S%G991><s%> the light. <S%G5457><s%>

For nothing <S%G3756><s%> is secret, <S%G2927><s%> that shall not be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest; <S%G5318><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> any thing hid, <S%G614><s%> that shall not be known <S%G1097><s%> and come <S%G2064><s%> abroad. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5318><s%>

Take heed <S%G991><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> you hear: <S%G191><s%> for whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall be given; <S%G1325><s%> and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not, from him shall be taken <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he seems <S%G1380><s%> to have. <S%G2192><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> to him his mother <S%G3384><s%> and his brothers, <S%G80><s%> and could <S%G1410><s%> not come <S%G4940><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> him for the press. <S%G3793><s%>

And it was told <S%G518><s%> him by certain which said, <S%G3004><s%> Your mother <S%G3384><s%> and your brothers <S%G80><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> desiring <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you.

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, My mother <S%G3384><s%> and my brothers <S%G80><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> it.

Now <S%G2532><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass on <S%G1722><s%> a certain <S%G1520><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> that he went <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> with his disciples: <S%G3101><s%> and he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Let us go <S%G1330><s%> over <S%G1330><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the lake. <S%G3041><s%> And they launched <S%G321><s%> forth. <S%G321><s%>

But as they sailed <S%G4126><s%> he fell asleep: <S%G879><s%> and there came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> a storm <S%G2978><s%> of wind <S%G417><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the lake; <S%G3041><s%> and they were filled <S%G4845><s%> with water, and were in jeopardy. <S%G2793><s%>

And they came <S%G4334><s%> to him, and awoke <S%G1326><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> master, <S%G1988><s%> we perish. <S%G622><s%> Then <S%G1161><s%> he arose, <S%G1453><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and the raging <S%G2830><s%> of the water: <S%G5204><s%> and they ceased, <S%G3973><s%> and there was a calm. <S%G1055><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Where <S%G4226><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%> And they being afraid <S%G5399><s%> wondered, <S%G2296><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G686><s%> manner <S%G686><s%> of man is this! <S%G3778><s%> for he commands <S%G2004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> and water, <S%G5204><s%> and they obey <S%G5219><s%> him.
And they arrived <S%G2668><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gadarenes, <S%G1046><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is over <S%G495><s%> against <S%G495><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And when he went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> to land, <S%G1095><s%> there met <S%G5221><s%> him out of the city <S%G4172><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> long <S%G2425><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> and ware <S%G1737><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> clothes, <S%G2440><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> stayed <S%G3306><s%> in any house, <S%G3614><s%> but in the tombs. <S%G3418><s%>

When he saw <S%G1492><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> he cried <S%G349><s%> out, and fell <S%G4363><s%> down before <S%G4363><s%> him, and with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> have I to do with you, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> you Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> most <S%G5310><s%> high? <S%G5310><s%> I beseech <S%G1189><s%> you, torment <S%G928><s%> me not.

(For he had commanded <S%G3853><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> to come <S%G1831><s%> out of the man. <S%G444><s%> For oftentimes <S%G4183><s%> <S%G5550><s%> it had caught <S%G4884><s%> him: and he was kept <S%G5442><s%> bound <S%G1196><s%> with chains <S%G254><s%> and in fetters; <S%G3976><s%> and he broke <S%G1284><s%> the bands, <S%G1199><s%> and was driven <S%G1643><s%> of the devil <S%G1142><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>)

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is your name? <S%G3686><s%> And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Legion: <S%G3003><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> were entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him.
And they sought <S%G3870><s%> him that he would not command <S%G2004><s%> them to go <S%G565><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the deep. <S%G12><s%>

And there <S%G1563><s%> was there an herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G2425><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding <S%G1006><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the mountain: <S%G3735><s%> and they sought <S%G3870><s%> him that he would suffer <S%G2010><s%> them to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> them. And he suffered <S%G2010><s%> them.

Then <S%G1161><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> the devils <S%G1140><s%> out of the man, <S%G444><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the swine: <S%G5519><s%> and the herd <S%G34><s%> ran <S%G3729><s%> violently down <S%G2596><s%> a steep <S%G2911><s%> place into <S%G1519><s%> the lake, <S%G3041><s%> and were choked. <S%G638><s%>

When they that fed <S%G1006><s%> them saw <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> they fled, <S%G5343><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> it in the city <S%G4172><s%> and in the country. <S%G68><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> they went <S%G1831><s%> out to see <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was done; <S%G1096><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> the man, <S%G444><s%> out of whom <S%G3739><s%> the devils <S%G1140><s%> were departed, <S%G1831><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> clothed, <S%G2439><s%> and in his right <S%G4993><s%> mind: <S%G4993><s%> and they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

They also <S%G2532><s%> which saw <S%G1492><s%> it told <S%G518><s%> them by what <S%G4459><s%> means <S%G4459><s%> he that was possessed <S%G1139><s%> of the devils <S%G1139><s%> was healed. <S%G4982><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G537><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the country <S%G4066><s%> of the Gadarenes <S%G1046><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about <S%G4066><s%> sought <S%G2065><s%> him to depart <S%G565><s%> from them; for they were taken <S%G4912><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> fear: <S%G5401><s%> and he went <S%G1684><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> the ship, <S%G4143><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> back <S%G5290><s%> again. <S%G5290><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the man <S%G435><s%> out of whom <S%G3739><s%> the devils <S%G1140><s%> were departed <S%G1831><s%> sought <S%G1189><s%> him that he might be with him: but Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G630><s%> him away, <S%G630><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Return <S%G5290><s%> to your <S%G4675><s%> own house, <S%G3624><s%> and show <S%G1334><s%> how <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things God <S%G2316><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> to you. And he went <S%G565><s%> his way, <S%G3598><s%> and published <S%G2784><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> how <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> to him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was returned, <S%G5290><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> gladly <S%G2234><s%> received <S%G588><s%> him: for they were all <S%G3956><s%> waiting <S%G4328><s%> for him.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Jairus, <S%G2383><s%> and he was a ruler <S%G758><s%> of the synagogue: <S%G4864><s%> and he fell <S%G4098><s%> down at <S%G3844><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and sought <S%G3870><s%> him that he would come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his house: <S%G3624><s%>

For he had <S%G1510><s%> one only <S%G3439><s%> daughter, <S%G2364><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> of age, and she lay a dying. <S%G599><s%> But as he went <S%G5217><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> thronged <S%G4846><s%> him.

And a woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G5607><s%> <S%G1722><s%> an issue <S%G4511><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> had spent <S%G4321><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> her living <S%G979><s%> on physicians, <S%G2395><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> could <S%G2480><s%> be healed <S%G2323><s%> of any, <S%G3762><s%>

Came <S%G4334><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%> him, and touched <S%G680><s%> the border <S%G2899><s%> of his garment: <S%G2440><s%> and immediately <S%G3916><s%> her issue <S%G4511><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> stanched. <S%G2476><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> me? When all <S%G3956><s%> denied, <S%G720><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and they that were with him said, <S%G2036><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> throng <S%G4912><s%> you and press <S%G598><s%> you, and say <S%G2036><s%> you, Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> me?
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Somebody <S%G5100><s%> has touched <S%G680><s%> me: for I perceive <S%G1097><s%> that virtue <S%G1411><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> out of me.

And when the woman <S%G1135><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that she was not hid, <S%G2990><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> trembling, <S%G5141><s%> and falling <S%G4363><s%> down before <S%G4363><s%> him, she declared <S%G518><s%> to him before <S%G1799><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> for what <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> she had touched <S%G680><s%> him, and how <S%G5613><s%> she was healed <S%G2390><s%> immediately. <S%G3916><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> be of good comfort: <S%G2293><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you whole; <S%G4982><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> in peace. <S%G1515><s%>

While he yet <S%G2089><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> there comes <S%G2064><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> from the ruler <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue's <S%G752><s%> house, saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Your daughter <S%G2364><s%> is dead; <S%G2348><s%> trouble <S%G4660><s%> not the Master. <S%G1320><s%>

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, he answered <S%G611><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not: believe <S%G4100><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> and she shall be made <S%G4982><s%> whole. <S%G4982><s%>
